title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: When resizing the window in the vertical direction, only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction.
3. Observe the excessive flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
